flawed_nl_solution:
Karen makes $3000 / (3/4) = $<<3000/(3/4)=4000>>4000 per month.
In three months, Karen would make a total of $4000 * 3 = $<<4000*3=120000>>120000.
To make the same amount of money John would need to work $120000 / $3000 = <<120000/3000=40>>40 months.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12000, not 120000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
